sense.name: acquiring skill
sense.commentary: TRAINING[+event] Refers to the act of practicing in order to gain skill.
sense.examples: My dog's training program took three years. John's martial arts training had made him a master ninja. This person has undergone more extensive training than anyone I know.

sense.name: result of being trained
sense.commentary: The attribute of a person who has been trained; the high level of skill a person possesses.
sense.examples: She's a woman of excellent training and refinement. Engineers from Intelli-Soft have the best training in the industry. John used his martial arts training to win the tournament.
